title: WTT/WTB: EPDG’s I need. Have some available for trade.
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTT/WTB: EPDG’s I need. Have some available for trade.
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for EPDGs I need, whether new or upgrades. List is long so just Pm me with what you got.  Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/975/41143335985_ffc57ca0fa_b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/958/41143337425_00b07aa83e_b.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="Jobu" post=1775872]Do you need McClean?[/QUOTE]

Hey Bryan, I do have a McLean in SGC 40.  Thanks for checking!
I have Shannon and spade available for sale.  Need them?
